response.original_title: See Red Women’s Workshop Talk 12th Dec 2018
response.overview: See Red Women’s Workshop was founded in 1974: they wanted to use their skills to combat negative images of women and to produce propaganda for the women’s liberation movement. They aimed to promote women’s empowerment and to challenge the impact of gender stereotyping and sexism. Using humour and reality-checks, they set out to design and print posters that were accessible and looked good.
response.title: See Red Women’s Workshop Talk 12th Dec 2018
